items.name: static let hierarchical: SymbolRenderingMode
items.desc: A mode that renders symbols as multiple layers, with different opacities applied to the foreground style.

items.name: static let monochrome: SymbolRenderingMode
items.desc: A mode that renders symbols as a single layer filled with the foreground style.

items.name: static let multicolor: SymbolRenderingMode
items.desc: A mode that renders symbols as multiple layers with their inherit styles.

items.name: static let palette: SymbolRenderingMode
items.desc: A mode that renders symbols as multiple layers, with different styles applied to the layers.
